message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this valuable product. Given its unique features and potential, I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. I propose a starting price of $2,200,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. This is my maximum budget for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective on the value.  However, the price you're proposing doesn't reflect the true worth of this product and the unique advantages it offers.  To move us closer, I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $1,900,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1,450,000.
